segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, he doesn't seem to notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool itself looks incredibly wobbly, almost tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out, making it very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to fall backwards at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself if that stool gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And he's holding a plate, which could shatter if he drops it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an accident waiting to happen, right there in the middle of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems completely unaware of the danger her brother is in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just reaching for her prize, so full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's hard to watch something so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone intervenes before he tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR
